judges: Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellant.
Mr. Chief Justice Bell took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Richard W. Davis, with him Doris, Katz, Buzgon & Davis, for appellant.
James R. Whitman, with him David J. Brightbill, and Lewis, Brubaker, Whitman & Christianson, for appellees.
Charles V. Henry, III, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kreider Estate.
Argued January 13, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Richard W. Davis, with him Doris, Katz, Buzgon & Davis, for appellant.
James R. Whitman, with him David J. Brightbill, and Lewis, Brubaker, Whitman & Christianson, for appellees.
Charles V. Henry, III, for appellee.
October 12, 1971:
